plugin.name: google-sheets
plugin.description: Read, write, and manage data in Google Sheets spreadsheets
plugin.context: Use for reading data from spreadsheets, writing structured output, appending rows, creating new spreadsheets, and managing spreadsheet data as structured input/output for agents

read_range.description: Read data from a specific range of cells in a spreadsheet
read_range.usage_context: When user wants to read data from cells, get table contents, or retrieve structured data for processing

spreadsheet_id.description: The ID of the spreadsheet to read from (from the URL or file ID)

range.description: The A1 notation range to read (e.g., 'Sheet1!A1:D10', 'Data!A:C', or 'B2:E5')

include_formula_values.description: Return formula values instead of calculated results

major_dimension.description: Whether to read data as rows or columns

large_range.message: Cannot read more than 10,000 cells at once. Please reduce the range size.

medium_range.message: Read {estimated_cells} cells? This may take a moment to process.

range.description: The actual range that was read (may differ from requested)

values.description: 2D array of cell values (rows of cells)

major_dimension.description: How data is organized (ROWS or COLUMNS)

output_guidance.success_description: Returns cell values as a 2D array with row and column counts.

common_errors.auth_failed: Your Google Sheets connection has expired. Please go to Settings → Connected Apps to reconnect Google Sheets.
common_errors.spreadsheet_not_found: The spreadsheet was not found. Please check the spreadsheet ID and ensure you have access.
common_errors.invalid_range: The range format is invalid. Use A1 notation like 'Sheet1!A1:D10' or 'A:C'.
common_errors.permission_denied: You don't have permission to access this spreadsheet. Please request access from the owner.
common_errors.api_rate_limit: Too many requests in a short time. Please wait a moment and try again.
common_errors.insufficient_permissions: Google Sheets permissions are insufficient. Please reconnect with full spreadsheet access.

write_range.description: Write or update data in a specific range of cells
write_range.usage_context: When user wants to write data to cells, update existing values, or save structured output from processing

spreadsheet_id.description: The ID of the spreadsheet to write to

range.description: The A1 notation range to write (e.g., 'Sheet1!A1:D10' or 'Data!B2')

values.description: 2D array of values to write (array of rows, each row is an array of cell values)

input_option.description: How to interpret input: RAW (as-is) or USER_ENTERED (parse formulas, dates, etc.)

overwrite_existing.description: Whether to overwrite existing data in the range

max_cells.message: Cannot write more than 10,000 cells at once. Please reduce the data size.

large_write.message: Write {total_cells} cells? This will overwrite existing data in the range.

output_guidance.success_description: Confirms the write with counts of updated rows, columns, and cells.

common_errors.auth_failed: Your Google Sheets connection has expired. Please reconnect in Settings → Connected Apps.
common_errors.spreadsheet_not_found: The spreadsheet was not found. Please check the spreadsheet ID.
common_errors.invalid_range: The range format is invalid. Use A1 notation like 'Sheet1!A1:D10'.
common_errors.permission_denied: You don't have permission to edit this spreadsheet. Please request edit access.
common_errors.invalid_values: The values array format is invalid. Provide a 2D array of cell values.
common_errors.api_rate_limit: Too many write requests. Please wait a moment and try again.
common_errors.insufficient_permissions: Google Sheets write permissions are insufficient. Please reconnect with full access.

append_rows.description: Append new rows of data to the end of a sheet
append_rows.usage_context: When user wants to add new records, log data, or continuously append information without specifying exact cell positions

spreadsheet_id.description: The ID of the spreadsheet to append to

range.description: The sheet name or range where data should be appended (e.g., 'Sheet1' or 'Sheet1!A:D')

values.description: Array of rows to append (each row is an array of cell values)

input_option.description: How to interpret input: RAW (as-is) or USER_ENTERED (parse formulas, dates, etc.)

insert_data_option.description: Whether to insert new rows or overwrite existing empty rows

max_rows.message: Cannot append more than 1,000 rows at once. Please reduce the batch size.

updated_range.description: The range where data was appended

appended_columns.description: Number of columns in appended data

table_range.description: Full range of the table including appended data

sheet_name.description: Name of the sheet where data was appended

output_guidance.success_description: Confirms the append with the updated range and counts of appended rows and cells.

common_errors.auth_failed: Your Google Sheets connection has expired. Please reconnect in Settings → Connected Apps.
common_errors.spreadsheet_not_found: The spreadsheet was not found. Please check the spreadsheet ID.
common_errors.invalid_range: The range or sheet name is invalid. Use sheet names like 'Sheet1' or ranges like 'Sheet1!A:D'.
common_errors.permission_denied: You don't have permission to edit this spreadsheet. Please request edit access.
common_errors.invalid_values: The values array format is invalid. Provide an array of rows.
common_errors.api_rate_limit: Too many append requests. Please wait a moment and try again.
common_errors.insufficient_permissions: Google Sheets write permissions are insufficient. Please reconnect with full access.

create_spreadsheet.description: Create a new Google Sheets spreadsheet
create_spreadsheet.usage_context: When user wants to create a new spreadsheet for organizing data, starting a new project, or generating reports

title.description: The title/name of the new spreadsheet

sheet_names.description: Names of sheets to create (default is a single sheet named 'Sheet1')

initial_data.description: Optional initial data to populate the first sheet

max_sheets.message: Cannot create more than 20 sheets at once. Please reduce the number of sheets.

spreadsheet_id.description: Unique identifier for the new spreadsheet

spreadsheet_url.description: URL to open the spreadsheet in Google Sheets

sheet_count.description: Number of sheets in the spreadsheet

sheets.description: List of sheets in the spreadsheet

output_guidance.success_description: Returns the new spreadsheet ID, URL, and list of created sheets.

common_errors.auth_failed: Your Google Sheets connection has expired. Please reconnect in Settings → Connected Apps.
common_errors.quota_exceeded: You've reached your spreadsheet creation limit. Please try again later.
common_errors.invalid_title: The spreadsheet title is invalid or too long. Please use a shorter title.
common_errors.invalid_sheet_names: One or more sheet names are invalid. Sheet names cannot be empty or contain special characters.
common_errors.api_rate_limit: Too many creation requests. Please wait a moment and try again.
common_errors.insufficient_permissions: Google Sheets creation permissions are insufficient. Please reconnect with full access.

get_spreadsheet_info.description: Get metadata and information about a spreadsheet
get_spreadsheet_info.usage_context: When user wants to explore spreadsheet structure, list available sheets, or get properties before reading/writing

spreadsheet_id.description: The ID of the spreadsheet to get information about

include_sheet_data.description: Include detailed information about each sheet (rows, columns, etc.)

include_data_ranges.description: Include information about data ranges in each sheet

sheet_count.description: Number of sheets in the spreadsheet

row_count.description: Number of rows (when include_sheet_data is true)

column_count.description: Number of columns (when include_sheet_data is true)

output_guidance.success_description: Returns spreadsheet metadata including title, locale, and list of sheets with details.

common_errors.auth_failed: Your Google Sheets connection has expired. Please reconnect in Settings → Connected Apps.
common_errors.spreadsheet_not_found: The spreadsheet was not found. Please check the spreadsheet ID and ensure you have access.
common_errors.permission_denied: You don't have permission to access this spreadsheet. Please request access from the owner.
common_errors.api_rate_limit: Too many requests. Please wait a moment and try again.
common_errors.insufficient_permissions: Google Sheets read permissions are insufficient. Please reconnect with full access.
